Reviews.Title: “Secret pearl in the centre of Rome”
Reviews.Author: Dimitiri_Netherlands
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a peaceful, comfortable and inexpensive place in the centre of Rome, you have to definitively stay at the hotel Centro Pellegrini. I have spent a week-end there and I have enjoyed the beautiful green park in which the hotel building is, the warm hospitality of the hotel management and the simple comfort of the hotel room and facility. And I could also park my car for free. Highly recommended!

HotelInfo.Name: Centro Pellegrini
HotelInfo.Address: Via Vincenzo Ambrosio, 00136 Rome, Italy
